fields.label: After Add to Cart Button Message
fields.name: mg_after_add_to_cart_button_message

fields.label: Process Descriptors
fields.name: woo_process_descriptors
fields.instructions: Add information that shows up right below the shop listings. Allows for a minimum of 3 and a maximum of 3 descriptor sections. Each section gets an Icon (svg), a Title, and Text. The SVG must match the title of the actual file. If not sure, it's best to ask one of the developers.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: The name of the icon file

fields.label: 50 / 50 Actions
fields.name: woo_shop_fifty_fifty
fields.instructions: Add two sections that display a title, content, and a link

fields.label: Social Links
fields.name: social_links
fields.instructions: This area is for adding social media sites / associated links and icons

sub_fields.label: Social Link
sub_fields.name: social_link
sub_fields.instructions: The URL for the social media

fields.label: Footer Information
fields.name: footer_information
fields.instructions: Information that show up to the right of the sign up and left of the navigation in the footer on desktop. This also shows up at the very bottom on mobile
